        public javax.swing.ImageIcon addFirstWeapon​(javax.swing.ImageIcon icon,
                                            int numAttachments)
        adds a weapon in the upper righthand corner of the cell, assumes the first weapon slot is empty
        Parameters:
        icon - the current image of the cell
        numAttachments - number of attachments for the first weapon
        Returns:
        an updated image for a cell

      • addSecondWeapon

        public javax.swing.ImageIcon addSecondWeapon​(javax.swing.ImageIcon icon,
                                             int numAttachments)
        adds a weapon in the lower righthand corner of the cell, assumes the second weapon slot is empty
        Parameters:
        icon - the current image of the cell
        numAttachments - number of attachments for the second weapon
        Returns:
        the update image of the cell

      • addAlien

        public javax.swing.ImageIcon addAlien​(javax.swing.ImageIcon icon,
                                      LifeForm alien)
        places an Alien icon (circle) in the center of the cell the Alien's life point will be a bar "behind" the Alien, i.e. if the Alien is facing North, the bar will appear to the South if the Alien is carrying a weapon, the weapon will appear as a dot in the center of Alien's icon
        Parameters:
        icon -
        alien -
        Returns:

        public javax.swing.ImageIcon addHuman​(javax.swing.ImageIcon icon,
                                      Human human)
        places an Alien icon (circle) in the center of the cell the Alien's life point will be a bar "behind" the Alien, i.e. if the Alien is facing North, the bar will appear to the South if the Alien is carrying a weapon, the weapon will appear as a dot in the center of Alien's icon
        Parameters:
        icon -
        alien -
        Returns:

      • addLifeFormWeapon

                                               int numAttachments)
        add the icon for a weapon belonging to a lifeform in the center of the cell
        Parameters:
        icon - the current cell image
        numAttachments - how many attachments the lifeform's weapon has
        Returns:
        the updated image

      • addLifeBar

        public javax.swing.ImageIcon addLifeBar​(javax.swing.ImageIcon icon,
                                        LifeForm being)
        add a lifebar "behind" a Lifeform. If the LifeForm is facing North, the lifebar will be on the south side of the lifeform icon
        Parameters:
        icon - the current cell image
        numAttachments - how many attachments the lifeform's weapon has
        Returns:
        the updated image
